mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EARLY_BIRD_COUPON (EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_ID, FOOD_TYPE, EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_AMOUNT, EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_EXPIRED_DATE, DISCOUNT_TYPE, DISCOUNT_VALUE, EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_NAME, IS_DUPLICATE_ALLOWED, IS_AVAILABLE) VALUES (EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{foodType}, #{earlyBirdCouponAmount}, #{earlyBirdCouponExpiredDate}, #{discountType}, #{discountValue}, #{earlyBirdCouponName}, #{isDuplicateAllowed}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EARLY_BIRD_COUPON ORDER BY EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_ID DESC

SELECT e.EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_ID, e.FOOD_TYPE, e.EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_AMOUNT, e.DISCOUNT_TYPE, e.DISCOUNT_VALUE, e.EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_EXPIRED_DATE, e.EARLY_BIRD_COUPON_NAME, e.IS_DUPLICATE_ALLOWED, e.IS_AVAILABLE FROM early_bird_coupon e WHERE e.FOOD_TYPE = #{foodType} AND e.IS_AVAILABLE = 1
